title: Help Wanted - Bitmap font designers
content:
Hi,   
   
If you're a type designer specializing in bi-level bitmap fonts I'd like to hear from you. I'm looking to acquire some new designs for our SPOT product line ( [http://www.microsoft.com/resources/spot/default2.mspx](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221230/http:/www.microsoft.com/resources/spot/default2.mspx)) which currently uses a bitmap font derived from Matthew Carter's Nina design.   
   
If you're interested in working on this project please drop me a line, or if you have any recommendations as to those who are doing the best work in this field please pass on their details.   
   
Cheers, Si   
 [simonda@microsoft.com](mailto:simonda@microsoft.com)
author: sii

comments.content:
Not one response?   
   
Maybe everyone has responded off forum?

Hi Mike,   
   
A number of designers contacted me directly, and we're moving forward with a few ideas.   
   
I'm still interested in hearing from other designers, especially those who do most of their font work in the bitmap field.   
   
We're looking to acquire a bunch of designs, not just one or two.   
   
Cheers, Si
